fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Full House: When you are in a room with 5 or more people (including yourself), learn how many of them win with you at the end of the phase, Influenceable. 
- Suitor: You gain the Suitor’s Quarters buff. [Activates D3]
- Housekeeper: Learn a player’s name. The room they went to last night had a true Outsider. (May be themselves) [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Vaults: Gain a special card of your choice. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3]
- Passages: Visit another room on top of your regular room that isn’t listed in available rooms for the Night phase. Cannot be role specific rooms or the Graveyard. [1 use, Unique]
